Text:
We have blocked the posting of links to imgzilla because it's crap site full of popups.

You can easitly get around our block by posting links to bt-chat pages which contain links to imgzilla.

But when we catch people doing that, we ban them and delete all of their torrents.

I wouldn't do it again if I was you.

I've locked your account to ensure you get this message.  When you do, rock up to the forum or irc channel and a mod will unlock your account for you.
